items._title: Introducing Lightfast: Memory Built for Teams
items.description: Today we're launching Lightfast—a new way for teams and agents to find what they need, understand context, and trace decisions across your entire organization.

body.plainText: We're excited to announce Lightfast, a new approach to organizational memory...

items._title: MCP Tools: Making Lightfast Available to Any Agent
items.description: We've built Model Context Protocol tools so any agent can search, retrieve, and understand your team's knowledge—with the same API you use for REST.

body.plainText: The Model Context Protocol is changing how agents access external systems...

items._title: How Lightfast Understands What You're Looking For
items.description: Behind the scenes of our hybrid retrieval pipeline: combining dense vectors, lexical search, graph relationships, and cross-encoder reranking for accurate results.

body.plainText: Semantic search is powerful, but it's not enough on its own...

items.description: Why we require citations for every answer, how we ensure faithfulness to source material, and what makes an answer trustworthy.

body.plainText: In an age of AI-generated content, verifiability matters more than ever...

items._title: Finding Expertise: The 'Who Owns What' Problem
items.description: How Lightfast tracks ownership, contributions, and context across your team to answer "who should I ask about this?"

body.plainText: Every organization has hidden expertise scattered across teams...
